verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: said] [ARGM-TMP: on Friday] [ARG1: that he is considering pardoning legendary boxer Muhammad Ali , despite there being no conviction to pardon . Ali was convicted in 1967 of refusing to report for military duty after being drafted into the Vietnam War . He declared himself a conscientious objector , citing religious reasons , but was sentenced to five years in prison and stripped of his heavyweight boxing crown] .

President Donald Trump said on Friday that he [V: is] considering pardoning legendary boxer Muhammad Ali , despite there being no conviction to pardon . Ali was convicted in 1967 of refusing to report for military duty after being drafted into the Vietnam War . He declared himself a conscientious objector , citing religious reasons , but was sentenced to five years in prison and stripped of his heavyweight boxing crown .

He declared himself a conscientious objector , citing religious reasons , but was sentenced to five years in prison and stripped of his heavyweight boxing crown .
